SEARCH
Package main.util

Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
main.util.FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object
Handles file input/output for users, projects, applications, and registrations. Supports reading from and writing to CSV/TSV-based text files.

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public List<List<String>> readFile(String fileName)
      Reads a tab-separated file and returns parsed data.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file in the /data directory
      Returns:
      list of rows (each row is a list of columns)

    • getDatabyRole

      public Map<String,List<List<String>>> getDatabyRole()
      Returns parsed user/project data grouped by role.
      Returns:
      map of role to parsed CSV data

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(String role, String nric, String newPassword) throws IOException
      Updates the password for a given user in their role-specific file.
      Parameters:
      role - user role (applicant/manager/officer)
      nric - NRIC to update
      newPassword - new password to set
      Throws:
      IOException - if file I/O fails

    • loadOfficersFromFile

      public List<HDBOfficer> loadOfficersFromFile(String path)
      Loads all officers from a TSV file.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the officer file
      Returns:
      list of HDBOfficer objects

    • saveOfficersToFile

      public void saveOfficersToFile(String path, List<HDBOfficer> officers)
      Saves officer data to the specified TSV file.
      Parameters:
      path - file path
      officers - list of officers to write

    • saveProject

      public boolean saveProject(String managerNRIC, String managerName, String projectName, String neighborhood, Date startDate, Date endDate, int twoRoomUnits, int threeRoomUnits, int twoRoomPrice, int threeRoomPrice, int maxOfficers)
      Saves a new BTO project to the ProjectList file.
      Parameters:
      managerNRIC - the NRIC of the manager creating the project
      managerName - the name of the manager
      projectName - the name of the project
      neighborhood - the neighborhood where the project is located
      startDate - the application opening date
      endDate - the application closing date
      twoRoomUnits - number of 2-room units available
      threeRoomUnits - number of 3-room units available
      twoRoomPrice - selling price for 2-room units
      threeRoomPrice - selling price for 3-room units
      maxOfficers - maximum number of officers that can be assigned
      Returns:
      true if the project was written successfully; false otherwise

    • loadAllUser

      public List<User> loadAllUser()
      Loads all users from all role-specific files.
      Returns:
      list of all users

    • saveApplication

      public void saveApplication(Application app)
      Saves a BTO application to file.
      Parameters:
      app - application object to save

    • updateApplication

      public void updateApplication(String nric, Application app)
      Updates the application status for a given user.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant whose record is being updated
      app - the Application object containing the new status and previous status

    • saveRegistration

      public void saveRegistration(Registration regist)
      Saves a new registration record to file.
      Parameters:
      regist - registration object

    • updateRegistration

      public void updateRegistration(String nric, String projectName, HDBOfficer.RegistrationStatus newStatus)
      Updates a registration's status for a given officer and project.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the officer whose registration is being updated
      projectName - the name of the project for which registration is updated
      newStatus - the new RegistrationStatus to apply

    • updateOfficerInProject

      public boolean updateOfficerInProject(String projectName, String officerNRIC, boolean isAssigning)
      Updates officer status and assignment in officer file.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the project name
      officerNRIC - NRIC of the officer
      isAssigning - true to assign, false to remove
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded, false otherwise

    • updateProjectOfficer

      public boolean updateProjectOfficer(String projectName, String officerNRIC, String officerName, boolean isAssigning)
      Updates project’s assigned officer list and slot information.
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the project
      officerNRIC - NRIC of the officer
      officerName - name of the officer
      isAssigning - true to assign, false to remove
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded, false otherwise

    • updateProject

      public boolean updateProject(String projectName, String newProjectName, String neighborhood, Date startDate, Date endDate, int twoRoomUnits, int threeRoomUnits) throws IOException
      Updates the project details (except price fields).
      Parameters:
      projectName - existing project name
      newProjectName - new project name
      neighborhood - new neighborhood
      startDate - new opening date
      endDate - new closing date
      twoRoomUnits - updated 2-room unit count
      threeRoomUnits - updated 3-room unit count
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded; false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if file I/O fails

    • deleteProjectFromFile

      public boolean deleteProjectFromFile(String projectName) throws IOException
      Deletes a project from the file based on name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the project to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeded; false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if file I/O fails
